name: wsbsd-terminal
description: Adds WSBSD terminal support to VS Code.

walkthroughs.title: Getting Started with WSBSD Terminal
walkthroughs.description: Learn how to use the WSBSD Terminal extension.

steps.title: Install WSBSD
steps.description: Download and install WSBSD from [here](https://github.com/TTSConsulting/WSBSD/releases) and place your BSD distros in `C:/WSBSD` (IF YOU DON'T HAVE WSBSD INSTALLED, PLEASE FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS IN THIS STEP).

steps.title: Open a BSD Terminal
steps.description: Run the **WSBSD: Open WSBSD Terminal** command from the Command Palette.
